We're interested in folks with networking or applied cryptography experience, ideally with demonstrable implementations in Go, C++, or Rust. Graduate work is a plus.

Our payment product, Fold [3], is implementing Lightning and building a cross-currency checkout process. Weâ€™d love to hear from any Docker / Kubernetes / Django experts out there.

We embrace remote work, and our team hails from all over. If you're a sharp engineer looking for the right opportunity to break into the cryptocurrency space, email work at thesis.co.
